CustomField.description: Calc field for data studio to mark the date the KPI was missed
CustomField.formula:
IF( Time_To_Census_KPI_SLA_Met__c = 0,
(IF( Ubiquity_Plan_Effective_Date__c < Census_and_Payroll_Instructions_Sent__c ,
Census_and_Payroll_Instructions_Sent__c +10, Ubiquity_Plan_Effective_Date__c + 10)), null)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Calc field for data studio to mark the date the KPI was missed
CustomField.label: Time to Census KPI Missed
